select.if: select a.* from tblMovie a where exists (select 'O' from tblMoviePlay b where #{date} between to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.movie_seq = a.movie_seq and not exists(select 'O' from tblTheaterClose where #{date} between to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and theater_seq = b.theater_seq))
